name: Garchomp C LV.X
author: Shizurow

poke_power.name: Healing Breath
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Garchomp C LV.X from your hand onto your Active Garchomp C, you may remove all damage counters from each of your Pokémon SP.

attacks.name: Dragon Rush
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy attached to Garchomp C. Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Garchomp C can’t use Dragon Rush during your next turn.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Garchomp C. Garchomp C LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
